full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KONG TZE GSOL MCHOD 'BRING PHUD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES SO, ,CHO GA LAS RNAMS MA ZIN BAR DU BZHUGS PAR BYA'O, ,KON TZE MCHOD PA 'DI CHO GA GANG BYED KYANG SNA SELDU BTANG NGO, ,RGYA MA BZA' DBANG CHUNG POD DU 'ONG BA'I DUS SU, ,RGYA RJE'I ZHAL NAS DBANG CHUNG BOD DU 'GRO NA, BOD KYI GTAM 'CHOS LA DKA' BAS, DUR RIL 'DEBS, ,RO SA LASBED, BAG MA RTZIS MED DU LEN, GTONG NA DUS MED GTAM 'CHOS GTONG, GLUD NAD MED DU BYED PA YIN PAS, KONG TZE'I MCHOD PA SNGON DU SONG NA, LAS DANG BYA BA GANG BYED KYANG BKRA SHIS BYIN RLABS CHE BA YOD ZHES SKAD DO, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,  ,,)
